sentences.en: Denis Law DID NOT relegate Manchester United. Birmingham City did.
sentences.cn: 让曼联降级的不是丹尼斯·劳,是伯明翰城队.

sentences.en: Might it not be better to relegate the king to a purely ceremonial function?
sentences.cn: 使该国王降级到一种纯粹礼仪性的职能难道不更好吗？

sentences.en: Might it not be better to relegate the King to a purely ceremonial function?
sentences.cn: 让国王变成纯粹发挥典礼仪式上象征作用的元首会不会更好？

sentences.en: People argue about how to relegate certain mushrooms.
sentences.cn: 人们讨论如何将这些蘑菇归类.

sentences.en: Relegate agency system solving fairness and efficiency problem to go up to still have drawback.
sentences.cn: 委托代理制在解决公平和效率问题上仍然有缺陷.

sentences.en: She likes to relegate difficult questions to her colleagues.
sentences.cn: 她总是把困难的问题推给她同事.

sentences.en: Some scientists relegate parapsychology to the sphere of quackery.
sentences.cn: 一些科学家把灵学归类到骗术范围.

trans.tran_cn: 转移, 归入, 提交
trans.tran_en: if a sports team is relegated, it is moved into a lower  division

trans.tran_cn: 使降级，使降职，转移，把…归类
trans.tran_en: if a sports team is relegated, it is moved into a lower  division
